BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Oversight - Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Performance in the 2024 General Election & Preparation for June 2025 Elections.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Performance in the 2024 General Election & Preparation for June 2025 Elections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to prohibiting the dissemination of materially deceptive audio or visual media in local elections
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the dissemination of materially deceptive audio or visual media in local elections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to improving young adults’ access to voter registration materials by requiring the department of education of the city of New York and the board of elections of the city of New York to provide students with registration materials in appropriate languages and to track and report on the efficacy of distributing registration materials to students
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improving young adults’ access to voter registration materials.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to providing survivors of domestic violence with guidance on making voter registration records confidential and voting by special ballot
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing survivors of domestic violence with guidance on making voter registration records confidential and voting by special ballot.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adjustment of contribution and expenditure limits to account for two-year council terms
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Adjustment of contribution and expenditure limits to account for two-year council terms.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the voters to approve, an amendment to the New York State Constitution to move New York City elections to even-numbered years
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amendment to the New York State Constitution to move New York City elections to even-numbered years.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.642/S.1215, which directs the Queens Board of Elections to provide language assistance in Bengali, Punjabi and Hindi.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Directs the Queens Board of Elections to provide language assistance in Bengali, Punjabi and Hindi. (A.642/S.1215)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.642/S.1215, which directs the Queens Board of Elections to provide language assistance in Bengali, Punjabi and Hindi.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Directs the Queens Board of Elections to provide language assistance in Bengali, Punjabi and Hindi. (A.642/S.1215)

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
